item.title: Get Pumped for Squid Game 2 After Reading These First Reactions
item.dc:creator: Germain Lussier
item.description: The second season of Netflix's most-watched show of all time is coming December 26.
item.content:encoded: The second season of Netflix's most-watched show of all time is coming December 26.

item.title: Space Startup Spins the Living Crap Out a Satellite—and It Actually Survived
item.dc:creator: Passant Rabie
item.description: The record-breaking milestone takes SpinLaunch one step closer to its goal of flinging satellites into space with a gigantic catapult.
item.content:encoded: The record-breaking milestone takes SpinLaunch one step closer to its goal of flinging satellites into space with a gigantic catapult.

item.title: Computer Programmer Named ‘Person of Interest’ in Killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO
item.dc:creator: Matt Novak
item.description: Social media profiles for Luigi Mangione include work in computer science.
item.content:encoded: Social media profiles for Luigi Mangione include work in computer science.

item.title: Elderly Woman Says Star Trek License Plates Stuck Her With Thousands of Dollars Worth of Speeding Tickets
item.dc:creator: AJ Dellinger
item.description: Her license plate had the same alphanumeric ID as the Starship Enterprise, now she gets tickets from across the country.
item.content:encoded: Her license plate had the same alphanumeric ID as the Starship Enterprise, now she gets tickets from across the country.

item.title: Beastars Caps Off Netflix’s Fall Anime Season in Spectacular Fashion
item.dc:creator: Isaiah Colbert
item.description: The show's final season proves even an established anime series can continue to evolve and surprise its audience.
item.content:encoded: The show's final season proves even an established anime series can continue to evolve and surprise its audience.

item.title: Reddit’s AI-Powered Search Could Replace a Major Use for Google
item.dc:creator: Kyle Barr
item.description: Reddit’s plan to bring more “human perspectives to everyone” is to use AI to round up all the most-upvoted posts.
item.content:encoded: Reddit’s plan to bring more “human perspectives to everyone” is to use AI to round up all the most-upvoted posts.

item.title: Why Is Everyone Talking About This Stylus for a Canceled Pixel Tablet?
item.dc:creator: Florence Ion
item.description: I'm sure the stylus would have been nice to use with the Pixel Tablet 2, but it's not happening anymore! Get over it!
item.content:encoded: I'm sure the stylus would have been nice to use with the Pixel Tablet 2, but it's not happening anymore! Get over it!

item.title: Move Over, Popcorn Bucket: Nosferatu‘s Sarcophagus Is Now a $20,000 Bed You Can Buy
item.dc:creator: Cheryl Eddy
item.description: Robert Eggers' vampire tale hits theaters on Christmas—but this lavish piece of tie-in furniture is available for order now.
item.content:encoded: Robert Eggers' vampire tale hits theaters on Christmas—but this lavish piece of tie-in furniture is available for order now.

item.title: Guru Who Pushed ‘Slapping Therapy’ to Cure Illness Sentenced Over Woman’s Death
item.dc:creator: Ed Cara
item.description: Hongchi Xiao was sentenced to 10 years in prison for the negligent manslaughter of 71-year-old Danielle Carr-Gomm, who died after she stopped taking insulin at one of Xiao's workshops.
item.content:encoded: Hongchi Xiao was sentenced to 10 years in prison for the negligent manslaughter of 71-year-old Danielle Carr-Gomm, who died after she stopped taking insulin at one of Xiao's workshops.

item.title: OpenAI Launches Sora Video Generator for All Users
item.dc:creator: Thomas Maxwell
item.description: Sora can convert text or image prompts into shockingly realistic video.
item.content:encoded: Sora can convert text or image prompts into shockingly realistic video.

item.title: A Humanities Course at UCLA Will Use an AI-Generated Textbook

item.title: The Solar-Capable Anker SOLIX Portable Generator Is Now Less Than Its Black Friday Price, Nearly 60% Off

item.description: At its usual $999 price, the Anker SOLIX C1000 is a solid recommendation — at just $429, it's a total steal.
item.content:encoded: At its usual $999 price, the Anker SOLIX C1000 is a solid recommendation — at just $429, it's a total steal.

item.title: Indie Game Platform Itch.io Says Its Domain Was Nuked Due to ‘Trash AI-Powered’ Phishing Report
item.dc:creator: Thomas Maxwell
item.description: Itch.io says an AI-powered "brand protection software" sent phishing reports notices to its domain registrar and hosting providers, causing its domain to be disabled.
item.content:encoded: Itch.io says an AI-powered "brand protection software" sent phishing reports notices to its domain registrar and hosting providers, causing its domain to be disabled.

item.content:encoded: The Anker power bank that can fully charge an iPhone nearly five times over is almost 50% off.

item.title: Google’s Willow Quantum Chip Crushes Classical Computers on a Cosmic Timescale
item.dc:creator: Isaac Schultz
item.description: Willow completed a benchmark computational task, demonstrating that errors decrease exponentially as the quantum computer's qubit count increases.
item.content:encoded: Willow completed a benchmark computational task, demonstrating that errors decrease exponentially as the quantum computer's qubit count increases.

item.title: The AI-Powered Shark Ultra Robot Vacuum Is Back at the Black Friday Price, 50% Off!

item.title: The ‘AI-Generated’ Mariah Carey Proves We’ll Never Be Free of the Christmas Queen
